If youre a casual player, please get this game, you will have a blast.

Are you competitve? Read first. Are you wanting to be a low ranking survivor? Well, let me ask you  some questions:

No patience?
No self control?
Do you get frustrated easily?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, do not get this game. There are some flaws in the balancing aspect of this game that will not be changed. They have been adressed to the devs and they wont bug on hard changes. Can you get rank 1 as a killer? Sure you can. Just be ready to not have fun because you're going to be playing a game that makes you run around a set path in the map chasing survivors where once you get close enough, they will perform an action that resets the chase. Is there a way around it? Mmm yes and no. If you are good at mind games then maybe you can be successful. A perfect survivor vs a perfect killer survivor wins unfortunatley.

Also theres other items and perks in this game for survivors that are also uncounterable and widen the gap of balance between the killers and survivors.

In conclusion, killers are forced into a meta where there is only a very very very limited amount of killers/perks to play and have a chance at success. 
Also, survivors are forced into a meta where certain items and perks are so overpowered that it wouldnt make sense to use anything else.

This means that there are so many other items, perks and characters that in the competitive scene go unused. This leads to little variety. The same meta has been in place for a very long time. I doubt it will change.

Das Spiel ist super. Ja, es hat seine kleinen Fehler und Macken, aber sobald man sich etwas in das Spiel hineingefuchst hat, beginnt es seine guten Seiten zu offenbaren  ^^. Survivor (Überlebender) so wie auch Killer haben ihre eigene Spieltaktik, dadurch gibt das Spiel verschiedene Perspektiven.
Ob das Spiel ,,toxic'' ist? Na ja, es geht. Man sieht zwischendurch Mal Survivor (Überlebender), aber auch Killer die ein etwas toxisches Verhalten zeigen. Bei sowas empfehle ich nur:,,Nicht drauf eingehen''.
Wie lange es einem Spielspaß gibt? So lange, wie man auf doofe Ideen kommt. Das schöne an dem Spiel ist, der Sieg bedeutet nicht alles. Entkommen ist zwar ein Sieg, aber auch eine schöne Verfolgung kann einem für die Runde reichen. Man kann sogar einigen Quatsch machen, sobald man mit Freunden spielt ist Benutzer eine Option oder auch einfach in Online-Runden mit bestimmten Set-Ups versuchen zu gewinnen (hat mir immer Spaß gemacht).
Das Rang System? Na ja, nach meine Meinung könnten sie das mal überarbeiten, es ist recht einfach, weshalb man auch auf hohen Ranks (als Killer, als Survivor(Überlebender)) Spieler bekommen kann, die sechs Ränge hinterher sind.
Auch ein Vorteil: Vieles ist In-Game erspielbar, was sagen soll: Auch ohne Geld in das Spiel zu stecken, kann man mithalten (dauert, wie auch bei anderen Spielen, etwas länger).
Wie oben erwähnt, ist das Spiel für Anfänger eher ein harter Einstieg, meine Empfehlung wäre:,,Spielt einfach weiter, nicht runter machen lassen und gebt dem Spiel eine Chance''.

Das war es dann mit meiner Rezension, ich hoffe doch, dass sie für manche eine Hilfe ist.
Esta muy bueno, solo falta que pongan el gesto de reirse :v

Non è un gioco, è un bug travestito da gioco, ma posso garantire che faccia divertire ugualmente, quando ovviamente trova una lobby.
Diciamo che i bug certe volte e soprattutto a seconda del ruolo che si sta giocando, sono un valore aggiunto (da gente che finisce per volare nel cielo a colpi ricevuti completamente a caso grazie a delle hitbox scandalose e al lag).
In ogni caso, se del resto ci ho giocato per oltre 1000 ore e altri anche più di me, è perché effettivamente è divertente. Di horror ha ben poco, almeno a mio giudizio, salvo un po' di ansia/pressione a seconda del killer, quindi secondo me è adatto a tutti, visto l'atteggiamento goliardico e assurdo che spesso e volentieri si trova nelle partite (gente che fa il teabag, il "sì sì con la testa", l'indicazione con il dito, ecc.).
Consigliatissimo!

现在画质优化了，给力。值得5折入手。新人要玩开始就别修机，找到机后先躲个20秒左右，一般都是等杀手看完再修，尤其是出生边的机子，老屠夫都会掂量出生距离来查机。还有记住路和哪儿有板有窗，逃跑要回头看屠夫怎么走。板是可以转一圈再放的，因为屠夫模型体积大，转弯多走点路，老手可以溜2圈，不要以为跟某人格分裂一样，守在板边，（除非你能在0.3秒内反应到杀手攻击并放板）拍不到就放了算了，如果用输入法的要把输入法关了，不然无法做快速动作，杀手在旁边死守的话就放弃救人吧，上去只会加速你的队友死亡或你没救下队友你也没了。手电筒第一次用的话要没事多练下，即使把手电浪费完，要把握准心。开门15秒，修台机100秒，人1秒4米，屠夫一秒4.6米，屠夫可以在4米距离冲刺砍到人，3秒踹一个板。自己看着练习吧，我只能帮你帮到这了。QWQ

非平衡对抗性游戏平衡很难做，屠夫和人类玩家是完全对立的团体，削弱谁都会惹众怒。屠夫削了还好，大不了玩别的，人类削了，全部遭殃。两次更新又削板子又削疲劳，哦吼完蛋。
其实游戏最主要的问题不是在于人类屠夫孰强孰弱，而是某些机制的不完善让玩家体验极差。首先是组队问题，语音开黑我不反对，但为什么白段的能和红段的组队，匹配的屠夫还是白段的。然后是炸鱼问题，不得不说这游戏真的是我见过炸鱼炸的最厉害的游戏，人类萌新大都停留在19 20 段，18段几乎全是炸鱼的，各种红针红齿轮体验极差。然后是拔线问题，拔线没有惩罚， 老油条一言不合就拔线，萌新也不学好，听见护士医生直接拔，倒地拔上钩拔。玩医生电疗模式都没开，就砍了一刀，四个全拔了你敢信？
以上问题在国服相当严重，也不知道为何国人玩个游戏戾气那么重。
最后总结一句，I think we did a pretty good job so far

Dead by Daylight -  one of the games I really have a kind of love / hate relationship to.
I like the concept and the game itself - 4 Survivors trying to activate/repair 5 generators to activate the exit gates and 1 Killer trying to prevent them from a successfull repair/escape and kill by chasing, catching and hooking them, to ultimately sacrifice the survivor to the entity.
Sounds fun and it definetly is if you play with friends. 

But be aware, when you play with random players, this game can get really frustrating due to a quite often - toxic & selfish community

In my opinion- as a survivor - you're not supposed to have a 100% chance getting out of the game alive. You're supposed to try and reach the exit by teamwork using any tool you've got with you or find on the map. 
In case a killer is "camping" - well, who cares, team up to free the survivor on the hook! 
Instead of teamwork loads of times you'll end up in a match having selfish team mates, not caring if you got hooked or downed by the killer, minding their own business.
Or after a very tense match, feeling good about the game - you return to the lobby, to find either survivors, killers or  both having a go at each other for whatever random reason. 
Killers ranting in the lobby when the last survivor tries finding & using the hatch, instead of just surrender and let them kill you.

However, If you are lucky enough getting a nice group in a public match, you'll have loads of fun & tension, within a game environment offering a great athmosphere as well as a levelling system so you can obtain items and special perks for your survivors & killers.

Benim incelemem farklı bir yönde olacak. Oyunu ilk çıktığı hafta arkadaşlarımla birlikte satın aldım. 10 saat kadar oynadım. Bir süre sonra oyunu tekrar indirdim ve oynamayı denedim hata aldım. Galiba BattleEye ile ilgili bir sıkıntıydı (üstünden 1 2 yıl geçti tam hatırlamıyorum hatta daha eski bile olabilir). Daha sonradan bilgisayarımda driverlarla ilgili bir sıkıntı olduğunu öğrendim (Başka bir oyunu açmaya çalışırken.) Tabi sonrasında bilgisayarı formatladım ve sürücü hatası ortadan kalktı. Şimdi oyunu sabah tekrar indirdim ve yine hatalarla karşılaştığım için oyuna giremiyorum bile. Kısacası oyun güzel olsa bile oyunu oynayamıyorum.

17年11月入坑，是个不错的好游戏。但是游戏内的玩家有好一部分全局观不够，缺乏团队精神和牺牲精神（也许他们博弈论学得不好？？）  ；然后国内的屠夫玩家素质参差不齐（守尸 or 针对）可能会导致部分玩家游戏体验差。但是游戏整体风格是不错的，玩法也非常符合“恐怖游戏”这一主题（滑稽~）..... 不过BUG还是有好一大堆哎，挂比也是层出不穷 

总之，这游戏我只想说一句： pretty job so far

Не, если не играть, то игра норм, а так если честно, лучше на неё смотреть через ютуб, а то продавать демку за 549 рубицов, (или по скидке 50% 274 рубицов) то ещё кидалово.

Плюсы 
+ Это конечно идея, асимметричная игра за убийц и выживших.
+ Оригинальные маньяки и выжившие. 
+ Саундтрек, а именно главная тема (правда после переделок она начинает разрдражать).

Минусы, в основном одни минусы: 
- Конкуренция, её просто нет, раз нет конкуреции то можно и халтурить.
- Однообразие, игре нечем похвастаться в плане геймплея: за выживших это починка генов и эстафета по палеткам, за убийцу эстафета по палеткам и повешение на кукан.
- Нет режимов, только рейтинг, за пять лет, "развития" игры.
- Весь достойный контент запихнули в длс (это перки и маньяки), и то половина длс это рескин старых маньяков которых понерфили. 
- Баги которые 5 лет не исчезают на время, и возвращаются через обновление.
- Разрабы жёстко пиарятся за счёт лицензированных убийц.(только за счёт этого игра ещё на плову). Что уж говорить об отношении разрабов к игре и комьюнити, им просто насрать, в буквальном смысле. 

Но нормисов все устраивает, и это главное, пустая игра, с пустыми персонажами и пустыми игроками (Dead Insaid короче), иногда складывается ощущение что это чистилище, (не хотел бы я после смерти попасть в дбд).

我也是萌新，玩的时候炒鸡紧张，而且我非常悲催的有一个被动技能叫做开局遇鬼，心态爆炸了不知道有多少回，刚开始玩总是爆米花，被鬼追的时候就开始慌神，一砍一个准，遇到过全局只追着我一个砍挂我守到死让我心态爆炸的，也遇到过只剩我一个的时候带我找地窖的鬼，还碰到过卡得不知道自己在哪的鬼，玩鬼的时候因为段位太低经常排很久才能排到人，遇到人皇被当猴溜的时候也非常生气，碰到萌新也会放走几个，也遇到了许多有趣的朋友，黎明杀机这个游戏带给我许多乐趣，刚开始玩肯定会觉得有点难，但是会越来越好的，希望玩这个游戏的朋友们能有一个好的游戏体验，第一次写评论，见笑了୧(๑•̀◡•́๑)૭

J'ai maintenant presque 1000 heures de jeu sur DbD. J'ai passé la moitié à jouer seul en survivant avant de rencontrer des gens par hasard et de finir par survivre avec eux mes 500 dernières heures parmi lesquelles j'ai commencé à jouer tueur.

• En survivant seul : c'était amusant quand j'ai commencé le jeu en juillet 2017. Ensuite, je ne sais pas ce qu'il s'est passé, mais les tueurs sont tous devenus des facecampers et tunnelers de l'enfer et les survivants jouent maintenant ultra immersed et ne viennent pas vous aider (pire, ils vous farm en vous deccrochant volontairement devant le tueur), ils ne font pas les générateurs... On s'ennuie vite à jouer seul, on meurt rapidement, on rush les générateurs pour vite sortir de la map... Aucun intérêt à moins d'être très bon.

• En survivant SWF (avec des amis) : c'est mieux. Vous allez rigoler, vous savez pourquoi on ne vient pas vous aider, vous savez ce qu'il se passe sur la map... Vos parties ne dépenderont plus du niveau plus ou moins discutable de parfaits inconnus. Peu importe comment se passe la partie, que le tueur soit bon ou mauvais, on prend largement plus de plaisir et on est moins salé. 

• En tueur : j'ai commencé très tard à jouer tueur parce que c'est en first person et que j'étais vraiment mauvais... Finalement, pour faire mes rituels, je me suis forcé et je me suis amusé avec la nurse et le piégeur. Je suis maintenant meilleur et ça se passe beaucoup mieux... quand les survivants ne viennent pas me troller, me taunt, me foutre la lampe torche dans les yeux à toutes les palettes... Certains survivants jouent aussi mal que les tueurs et rendent le jeu très pénible. Je conseille de les ignorer et de ne pas chercher à les attraper. Perte de temps. Il faut savoir perdre et rester calme. Gagner en trichant, en facecampant, en tunnelant, c'est nul, ça ne sert à rien, aucun honneur, aucun fairplay. Jouez de manière sympathique, les survivants seront sympathiques aussi. Il teabag ? Faites un "oui" de la tête. Rentrez dans leur jeu. Ça se passera beaucoup mieux. :) 

IMPORTANT : Jouez LES DEUX rôles de manière plus ou moins égale. Ça vous permettra de vous améliorer, déjà, et de comprendre les difficultés de l'autre... 
Ce jeu est très bien. Les DLC sont plutôt pas mal, le contenu aussi. Parfois, c'est un peu difficile, oui, on est salé. Ça arrive. Jouez de façon bienveillante, vous serez récompensés.
game is great by daylight

Diría que por lejos es la mejor experiencia cooperativa y multijugador de estos últimos años.

Pese a algunos bugs y desajustes en el gameplay todas las partidas son disfrutables.
Genera tensión y nerviosismo jugando psicológicamente con el estado de indefensión de los cuatro supervivientes, que literalmente carecen de recursos para poder enfrentar al Asesino controlado por otro jugador. [4 vs 1]

En este punto entra la habilidad, el sígilo y la experiencia de los jugadores para poder activar los generadores, rescatar a tus compañeros capturados y salir con vida de cada mapa.
Obviamente el "durante" es agónico, especialmente si no lo jugás con amigos y no tenés forma de comunicación con tus compañeros de equipo, dado que el juego carece de chat ya sea por texto o voz.

Con el transcurso de las partidas se van adquiriendo items y habilidades que mejoran la performance de cada uno de los personajes, como así también el jugador que los controla ya no comete tantos errores y empieza a desenvolverse con mayor soltura.

Ser asesino tiene su encanto dado que la indefensión de los supervivientes ya no se padece sino que se disfruta, y no vas a querer que nadie quede vivo. Lamentablemente hay un "pero" bastante puntual, y es que algunos asesinos optan por quedarse al lado de los supervivientes capturados, lo cual evita en la mayoría de los casos el poder salvarlos porque nos golpea e incapacita al intentar acercarnos. 

Otro de los "peros" es que hay muchísimo desbalance con respecto a los asesinos de los DLCs, ya que algunos tienen habilidades demasiado poderosas y junto a algunos items que vigorizan la maldad las partidas para los supervivientes pueden volverse literalmente un infierno.

El diseño de los mapas es bastante correcto, algunos son repetitivos y si bien son muchos parecen iguales. Y punto aparte el mapa de la Fábrica de SAW, creo que si te toca ese mapa lo mejor es salirse de la partida porque es casi imposible salir con vida si no te toca un buen equipo. Está diseñado especialmente para que mueras. Si te toca ser asesino a festejar.

Deberían pulir el matchmaking porque a veces tocan partidas con lag, y es una pérdida de tiempo salir del lobby y volver a otro, ya sé que son unos segundos, pero cuando constántemente toca ping rojo te rompe los huevos. Podrían implementar algo para jugar con gente de la misma región y de esta forma se evitaría el tener que entrar y salir a cada rato.

Gráficamente es discreto pero agradable y el sonido bien de terror, con sus efectos y climas es brutal.

Altamente recomendado y con peligro de volverse un vicio!!!

Cheio de bugs e erros que irritam bastante, além dos próprios jogadores que fazem de tudo pra tornar sua vida em um inferno, mas ainda assim é um excelente jogo e eu compraria denovo se fosse necessário.

1,370.7 hrs on record
If your looking for a review on this game you've come to the wrong place, but if your looking for an outstanding cheese cake recipe you've come to the right place.

Ingredients: 
1 cup digestive plain sweet biscuit crumbs
3 tablespoons sugar
3 tablespoons melted butter
40 ounces softened cream cheese
1 cup sugar
3 tablespoons flour
1 tablespoon vanilla
1 cup sour cream
4 eggs

Directions:
For The base:.
If you're using a dark pan, preheat the oven to 350. If you are using a shiny pan, 375.
Combine the crumbs, melted butter and 3 tbsp sugar well and pat onto the bottom of a 9 inch springform pan. I also like to very very lightly butter the sides of the pan so that the cheesecake will not stick later on.
Bake for 10 mins in your preheated oven and remove. Let it cool while you prepare your batter.
For the batter:.
Make sure everything is at room temperature.
Combine sugar, cheese, flour and vanilla in a big bowl and mix on medium speed till well combined. Don't forget to scrape the bowl as you're doing this.
Mix in the sour cream till its incorporated well. Then, add the eggs one by one, mixing well after each addition.
Pour the batter into the springform and let it bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes After the baking time, turn off the oven and leave the door ajar. Let the cake cool in there for about 1 1/2 hours.
Remove the cake and let it cool thoroughly. Refrigerate overnight.
Release the sides of the springform.
Eat.

DbD im guten und ganzen ganz gut. Einige viele buggs die sehr nervig sind. Freedy Krüger ist OP af. Du kannst ihm nicht entkommen wenn du seiner Traumwelt bist. Das einzige, was dir deine Flucht ermöglichen kann ist, dass der Killer dumm wie Hundescheiße auf dem Gehweg ist. Ich habe es noch nie geschafft gegen diesen Charakter zu gewinnen und jedes mal wenn er auftaucht höre ich auch auf zu spielen. Er kann dich selbst durch die Wände in seiner Traumwelt sehen. Möglichkeiten der Traumwelt zu entkommen? Generator kaputt machen, sterben oder von einem Teammate geweckt werden. Alles was du machst ist 50% langsamer in der Traumwelt. Da er dich durch die Wände sehen kann und dich permanent verfolgt und du dich auch nicht verstecken kannst, ist es unmöglich von einem Teammate geweckt oder einen generator zu zerstören. Es ist in meinen Augen sinnlos und verdirbt das spiel um 80%.
Why do I still play this
This game is going Down hill so fast and it makes me sad. pretty much a great game was invented by a terrible company.

I got dead by daylight around 3 weeks ago. I have since played quite a few hours, at first i was kind of lost but i had friends who played it too who helped explain it to me and helped me out a little bit which made the game so much more enjoyable. I will admit the tutorial they provide is helpful but its pretty long i reccomend an experienced player helping you out but it is definetly learnable on your own.

PROS:
-Good story, really interesting killers and survivors
-Definetly terrifying in the begining which is good for those of us who like the occasional jump scare, the killers can and definetly will sneak up on you.
-Easy to play with friends.
-Relatively cheap, i reccomend waiting for a sale because i bought it during the summer sale and it was much nicer on my wallet.

CONS:
-The community is toxic, there are definetly killers and players who arent toxic but majority of the time it will be a toxic group.
-In pubic matches theres no easy way to communicate with the other survivors other than a small chat prior to the game, theres no sense of communication or strategy unless you decide prior the game without any knowledge of the killer, makes it more difficult to play as a team surviving.
- At times certain players will have a much higher advantage simply because theyre buying all the extra killers and survivors. So this game does not end at the 20 dollars if you want those advantages.
-there match making actually sucks monkey butt, it takes ofever if you paly killer and its sometimes just as bad when you play survivor.

Other than those cons, i definetly reccomend the game, i have enjoyed my experience with it so far and i hope you have the same experience. 
If you have any questions feel free to comment and i will answer as best i can.

An enjoyable yet terrifying  game thats gets the blood pumping as you sneak around trying fix 5 generators with 3 meat shields, all the while trying to avoid a murderous psychopath who only goal is to throw you on hook like poor pig babe. If I had any grip about this game its about the match making and even then its minor complaint since matches come up at a decent pace. More often then not ill be a really low ranked killer and a couple of meat sacks will be really high ranked and all of a sudden it becomes a really really hard game of tag. As a survivor its the opposite effect where your just trying to run away from the overly attached girlfriend and she JUST WONT GO AWAY.  But as I said matches come up pretty quick though   and when you die you can just que for another one. In all honesty, a very thrilling game that I have enjoyed.

Buggy, unbalanced, but still fun

Jogo bom, mas venho aq editar minha análise (pela segunda vez).

Recentemente ouve um update em que agora o assassino pode fechar o escotilha quando só há somente um único sobrevivente vivo, e ao fazer isso, todos os geradores são feitos e o jogador pode ir abrir os portões com um limite de tempo. E isso é RIDÍCULO, pois o spawn dos portões geralmente ficão muito perto um do outro, assim ficando fácil de o assassino ver o sobrevivente tentando abrir, e mesmo ficando escondido e abrindo o portão de pouco em pouco, ainda se torna quase impossível de escapar, pois tem o fator do tempo, que aparece após a escotilha ser fechada, e por fim acaba morrendo pelo tempo. Isso sem falar dos assassinos que teleportam ou os que possuem boost, como o Hillbilly, que facilmente vai de um portão a outro em 5 segundos. E assim só é possível escapar se o assassino for um player HORRÍVEL.

Jogo bem divertido, porém, pontos a ser melhorados e adicionados como:
 Servidores mais focados para o Brasil
Modo de jogatina com amigos estando como assassino mais vinculado com servidor publico para completar a sala
Melhoria de comunicação na partida entre os sobreviventes, caso esteja com pesssoas desconhecidas na sala
Possibilidade de testar os assassinos e sobreviventes de DLC para ser ter certeza no que vai gastar e não ser arrepender com o conteudo.
Metodos de atordoar os assassinos já que o jogo, não importa o que aconteça de atualização e balanceamento, está sempre favoravel para o assassino, tem que ter melhorias e formas de beneficiar mais os sobreviventes.
A party após fechada com amigos, não necessitar ter que sair da party, chamar todos os amigos novamente e ficar nesse loop para sempre jogar juntos, poderia já fechar uma unica party e ter o icone de invitar os amigos.

as the only really big "killer vs survivor" type of game on the market it decently scratches that itch.
but the amount of toxicity and horrible people and lack of punishment really makes the game suffer as a whole.

the game has a ton of promise but the amount of shit you have to get past to see the fun in it is insane.
overall i dont recommend the game unless you really just wanna waste some time or have a full squad of friends to play with.

No matter how much hatred I have towards the lazy developers of this game, I just cannot stop playing this game. The gameplay is just rewarding on both sides of the spectrum. Killer all four survivors as killer or escape with all four survivors, its completely up to you. But this game has many flaws such as unbalanced killers, survivors dont really have a difference once teachables are unlocked, bugs such as being stuck and unable to move, and so on. But once you look past that, the amount of great people I have found in this game and play with to this day is the reason I keep coming back. The streamers are entertaining and the gameplay has replay value. The so called "toxicity" in this game is taken way too seriously. You can't expect every person who loses to accept losing and go "gg" that doesnt happen in any videogame. Although strats such as camping and tunneling (Chasing the same survivor over and over) is an issue, its a playstyle that might help or hurt the killer depending on the teammates you are with. The mix of perks and addons make the game interesting but the same cant be said with survivor. With that said, this game has heaps to improve on but I think they can do it. Only time will tell....

EDIT: Abort mission, they will only release comestics and balance changes that don't balance anything. They admitted to never adding dedicated servers because it won't fill their pockets. Greedy developers.
